text: The disco clam, also called an electric frame scallop or electric clam, is a saltwater clam. It lives on coral reefs in the Indo-Pacific. It is a long. It is the only bivalve with a bright display. ==Distribution== Disco clams live on coral reefs in the Indo-Pacific. ==Diet== It eats very small plankton. Category:Bivalves
title: Disco clam
